metadata.Title: CVE-2022-23308 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
valid.c in libxml2 before 2.9.13 has a use-after-free of ID and IDREF attributes.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-23308` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml2 - 2.9.12+dfsg-4ubuntu0.1
libxml2-utils - 2.9.12+dfsg-4ubuntu0.1
python3-libxml2 - 2.9.12+dfsg-4ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.9.12+dfsg-4ubuntu0.1').
